title: alvar aalto exhibition font?
content:
Does any one know this typeface?  
Its being used for all the current copy and title work for the Alvar Aalto exhibion, barbican, London.  
Any ideas would be a great help.

cheers

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704152308im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/aalto_4364.jpg)

 [‹ Can anyone help IDing this font please...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704152308/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33013 "Go to previous forum topic") [Script style font closest to this? Script Id Guide NOT working right now.. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704152308/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33014 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sullivan

comments.content:
Looks like Futura to me.

- Lex
didn’t dalton magg produce a custom futura for the barbican?
